shop.text: This is the ideal waterbottle that works perfectly with this app. They both make you aware how much water you drink. And they motivate you to drink enough water by collecting dots during the day. Get your bottle at our website and drink healthy. Cheers!

text: Drinking water is important. It's very important for normal functioning of organism
When dehydrated, the skin can become more vulnerable to skin disorders and wrinkling.
Humans are 60 percent water, and our blood is 90 percent water.

notification.start: Let’s collect dots today! Fill your bottle, set the dial at 1 filled dot and take some sips.
notification.end: Well done! When correct your bottle is nearly empty and the lid shows 4 filled dots
reminders: Knock-knock: sipping water regularly water throughout the day is the best way to stay hydrated.
Hydration time!
It’s time to take some sips of water
Do not forget to sip some water
Why don’t you sip some water?
Take a sip
Sip water regularly throughout the day
Santé: take some water
Skøl: take some sips of water
At your health: sip some water!
Cheers: take some sips again
Take some sips and make use of the bathroom in time
How about some refreshing sips of water?
It’s sipping time again!
Have you not forgotten to take some sips of water?
Just drink some water and skip soft drinks and juices!
Time to drink some water
Why don’t you drink some water?
Remember to drink some water
It is easier to sip water when you have the Hydranome® water bottle with you.
Mmmm, take some refreshing sips of water.
Time for a water break!
Hi, time to sip some water
When it is warm: add some ice cubes to your water
Time! Drink some water
Sip some water!
Water helps to keep you cool
Sip some water and adopt a healthy hydration habit.
Water is life. Drink it.
Stay well hydrated and drink some water.
Dehydration results in reduced concentration and loss of humor. Sip some water?
Your body needs water
Time to take your water
Stay hydrated: sip some water
Water does not contain any sugar, is calorie free and easy available at the nearest tap
Skip sugared beverages and sip some water
Keep sipping: people with the habit of drinking water have a healthier lifestyle.
How about sipping some tea?
Add some mint to your water and enjoy!
Sip water and skip the ‘liquid candy’ like soft drinks and juices.
When you wake up: quench your morning thirst with plain water.
Take 2 or 3 sips of water. Tap water.
This message is to remind you to sip some water.
Drink some water
Sip your water!
